text:
Oh yeah,
now that you mention it, it was.

Just like now,
you hair was sparkling in the sunlight...

Stop it...!
Don't just suddenly say things like "sparkling"...!

Huh?
I just stated a fact.

I... at that time, my life changed because
of some curious person here.

The view from the stage... everyone cheering for me...
and my Houkura teammates...

Really,
it's something I never could have imagined myself.

...But, what do you think?
Do I seem different from back then to you?

...If we're talking about your Juri-ness...
then I don't think you've changed.

But as an idol, you've been working hard and growing,
so in that sense, I think you've been changing.

Well then... I guess I have to keep doing my best,
being true to myself from now on.
